visualHierarchy.headingSizes: Decreasing font size from H1 to Hn
visualHierarchy.textEmphasis: Bold for headings, standard for body, varying for navigation/buttons
visualHierarchy.colorContrast: High contrast between text and background for readability
visualHierarchy.elementGrouping: Logical grouping of related elements (e.g., navigation items, text blocks)

layoutPrinciples.gridSystem: Implied column-based layout, content aligned to invisible vertical lines
layoutPrinciples.contentAlignment: Left-aligned for main text blocks, right-aligned for navigation actions
layoutPrinciples.responsiveness: Adapts to different screen sizes, evident in spacing and text scaling
layoutPrinciples.negativeSpace: Ample use of negative space to create a clean and breathable layout

buttons.hoverEffect: Subtle change in background or text color

navigation.layout: Horizontal, with left-aligned brand/logo and right-aligned menu items/CTA
navigation.style: Clean, sans-serif text links, no active indicators visible in screenshot

otherAttributes.imageryStyle: High-quality, focused portrait photography for hero section
otherAttributes.iconography: Minimal, simple arrow icons for calls to action
otherAttributes.interactiveElements: Clear clickable areas for navigation and buttons
otherAttributes.backgroundTreatment: Hero section uses a full-bleed image with a dark overlay for text readability
otherAttributes.branding: Subtle use of brand logo (Norré®) in navigation
